content: Hello Finland and others: Is anyone working on FINDRISC for diabetes? I imagine this would be a Questionnaire... @Mikael Rinnetmäki ?
Hi @Jose Costa Teixeira, I don't know of anyone working on FHIR version of the assessment. I know some people involved in implementations with other technologies.
It comes close to what we do, so if there's an activity around that I'd consider getting involved.
